title: Bug Fixes & UX Improvements
description: This update focuses on fixing bugs, improving the user experience, and making ManaTap more reliable and polished.
features: Smart name checking now works in Run Analysis
Recent Public Decks title is now clickable
Shoutbox shows more active community with seed messages
fixes: Fixed build errors and syntax issues
Fixed Recent Public Decks only showing 1 deck (now shows up to 5)
Improved Deck Snapshot visual design (better color scheme)
Fixed shoutbox showing old messages (now filters to last 3 days)
Improved PostHog analytics (can now filter internal users)
